text: @SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe We're you prepared  for this #coronavirus . Was anyone in #Congress prepared. No. So, if @realDonaldTrump is to blame so are you and the  rest of  Congress. #DemocratsAreADisgrace #COVID19 #coronavirus #peoplevspelosi
